unnormalised: Crop insurance, eh? Good for our farmers in Maharashtra, especially with unpredictable rains. Heard many stories in my village, Shanti Niketan, how Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana helped after the floods last year. But payout delays, like getting money after Diwali, are a pain! My kisan friend, Ramesh, still complains about it. Hopefully, it improves! Gotta protect our annadatas! Need good rice for Onam's Sadhya.
